text: What I ve learned as a freshman at university Unless it s a STEM class  you re gonna be talking just about philosophy and life  Literally every single class is gonna be talking about something deep   I m a history major but high school history and college history are two very different things  Basically  high school more focuses on what happens but college strives to understand why something happens   Absolutely everything involves critical thinking  If you think you know how to critically think  you probably don t  But don t worry  you ll learn   It is soooo much better than high school  One month in and I learned to really not give a fuck   It s a lot more work but it s all very doable  When you write your papers make sure you do absolutely everything the teacher tells you to do in their corrections  You ll automatically get a better grade because they feel like you really listen to them   For my my nerds who never had to study  you better get some practicing in  You can t memorize your way through these classes  You need to take notes and lots of them   Anyway  if you have any questions  I m all ears
summary: As a freshman at university, I learned that history is a lot more work than high school history. I also learned that you need to take lots of notes and practice critical thinking in order to get a good grade in the history classes.
cleaned: freshman university learn history lot work high school history learn need lot note practice critical thinking order good grade history class

text: I outsmarted my teacher My Literature teacher assigned us a project where we had to write a letter to our future selves that she will mail to us in five years   The letter had to be at least   pages but after about half a page I couldn t think of anything else to say   I remembered that my teacher said that she wouldn t read it so that we wouldn t be afraid to write personal stuff in it but I figured that she might at least look at it to make sure it was   pages long  so I copied and pasted the same text I just wrote over and over until it filled two pages I got full credit for the assignment if you were wondering
summary: The Literature teacher assigned us a project where we had to write a letter to our future selves that she will mail to us in five years. She wouldn't read it, but she might look at it to make sure it was pages long. I copied and pasted the same text over and over until it filled two pages and got full credit for the assignment.
cleaned: literature teacher assign project write letter future self mail year not read look sure page long copy paste text fill page get credit assignment

text: I cutted for the first time last night  Not that deep thoI didn t go deep at all  I just got   pinkish barely visible thin scars It was   am and I ve been thinking about trying to cut for some time  I said I should just do it I got a fruit knife and a sharp knife  the fruit knife didn t do anything  I took the sharp and cutted a bit I felt so happy  It s hard to describe  I did it again and went deeper   I didn t bleed or anything  I just cutted slightly until I got a slightly visible scar I always feel empty  but after I cut I felt so happy  I started laughing and smiling  Looking back I was acting like a psychopath  I felt tho very happy The sucidal thoughts and loneliness was gone for that time  I didn t feel them However I feel like my cuts are invalid because I didn t go deep  I feel like I should go deeper for it to count as self harm  There are people who bleed and i barely scratched the surface  I feel like my cutting doesn t count I know self harm isn t healthy but I didn t go deep at all so it shouldn t be a problem  I kinds wanna do it again  But my parents are awake currently so I can t do it Is it really that bad for your health   If you don t bleed  what s the problem How should I be feeling  I m not feeling bad  I kinda feel like I wanna do it again but at the same time I know it isn t that healthy so I feel like I shouldn t
summary: Last night I cut with a fruit knife and a sharp knife. I didn't go deep and didn't bleed, but I felt very happy after I did it. I want to do it again, but my parents are awake so I can't do it now.
